remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常用於轉換的型別為相互轉換字串物件。The most common types to convert are to and from a string object. 預設實作會呼叫物件的方法的物件是否有效，而且如果目標類型是字串。The default implementation calls the object's method if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果這個方法無法轉換成目的地類型，它會擲回例外狀況。If this method cannot convert to the destination type, it throws a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.

param.span: 新屬性值的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of new property values.

param.span: 字典包含一系列的名稱值配對，從 屬性的呼叫傳回的每個屬性都會有一個配對。

span.span: The dictionary contains a series of name-value pairs, one for each property returned from a call to the method.

summary.span: 建立為物件提供一組屬性值的這個物件的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of this type given a set of property values for the object.

summary.span: 對於不變但是仍然要提供可變屬性的物件來說，這很有用。

span.span: This is useful for objects that are immutable but still want to provide changeable properties.

returns.span: 新建立的物件，或 (如果無法建立物件)。

span.span: The newly created object, or if the object could not be created.
The default implementation returns .

span.span: By default, a type does not return any properties.

span.span: If no properties should be exposed, this may return .

returns.span: 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 。

span.span: The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以直接呼叫這個方法的簡單實作正確的資料類型的方法。A simple implementation of this method can just call the method for the correct data type.
